StringTable.Language:
> Silk Road Ozarks Ozarks: Dense thickets filled with wildlife dot this rolling terrain. Hilltop trading posts sit beside a trade route that crosses the map from East to West. Teams are split across the trade route. Plymouth Plymouth: A bountiful land of natural treasures and grateful Pilgrims. Each colony can use intrepid Pilgrims and Scout Turkeys to explore the bountiful wilderness for Native Settlements and unique treasures. Asian Maps Randomly selects from all maps geographically located in Asia.

More... 7 Rodeleros ≠EP: %s This room is not compatible with ESOC Patch Age of Empires(R) III: The Asian Dynasties, version {gameVersion}; ESOC Patch, version 9.0.0.1 EP recorded game All Crates contain 125 resources instead of 100. All your Pikemen transform into Rodeleros. Dragoons have increased range, line of sight and hit points and do more damage. 19 Strelets 4 Lancers 5 Lancers 8 Rodeleros 9 Rodeleros Increases the hitpoints and attack of Disciples. Your War Hut units can build War Huts and Corrals. Decreases Cuirassier cost. Yumi Archer range increased. Daimyo and Shoguns train units faster, move faster, and have greater line of sight. TEAM 4 Urumis shipment has been received. TEAM 4 Urumis shipment has been received. TEAM 4 Urumi Increased all Crates to 125 resources. Increased all Crates to 125 resources. Increased all Crates to 125 resources. Docks have a greater attack, heal ships faster, and train ships more quickly. Highwayman, good against cavalry. Musketeer, Fusilier, Janissary, Highlander, Ashigaru, Consulate Stadhouder, Consulate Guerreiros, Dacoit, Pistolero, and Grenadier hand attack increased. Falconet, Heavy Cannon, Culverin, and Horse Artillery damage increased. Fishing Boats are cheaper and train faster. Warships have more range, line of sight and a greater attack. Warships have more range, line of sight and a greater attack, +1 Villager. Decreases cost and research time of naval military upgrades, +1 Villager. Decreases cost and research time of naval military upgrades. Decreases cost and research time of naval military upgrades, +2 Uhlans. 400 Coin Crate with every shipment Precious metals from the new world grant additional coin with all your shipments, starting with this one. Supply of 400 Coin. Huge Chests of 400 Coin Crate 400 Coin Large Abus Gun attack, line of sight, range and hitpoints increased. Hazza's computer can worth a crate of 100 Wood %s has found Hazza's computer worth a crate of 100 Wood Warships have more range, line of sight and a greater attack. This building requires more space for gatherers or crops around it. Crates of 300 Food, 300 Wood, and 200 Coin Diplomacy Distributivism Shipment has arrived. Distributivism Shipment has arrived. Observer Mode Allows for observers on any UIx map. See the map description for details on observer mode setup. Auto-pest inviters Enable/Disable InviteShield Show games hosted on a different patch Show/Hide Games with mismatching CRC Speed Factor Chu Ko Nu, Qiang Pikemen, Keshiks and Steppe Riders attack and hitpoints increased greatly, but their cost and the cost of their armies is also increased. Old Dynasty Reforms Old Dynasty Reforms Shipment has arrived. Ranged cavalry, good against cavalry / raiding cavalry Fast, flexible army of heavy and ranged cavalry.
2 Keshik: Fast ranged cavalry that is good against heavy cavalry.
2 Steppe Riders: Hand cavalry good against villagers and buildings. Ranged cavalry, good against cavalry / raiding cavalry Hand infantry, good against cavalry / artillery, good against infantry Versatile army of swordsmen and heavy cavalry.
4 Changdao: Hand infantry good against cavalry and buildings.
2 Meteor Hammer: Heavy cavalry that strikes from a distance, especially good against artillery. Hand infantry, good against cavalry / artillery, good against infantry Now your missionaries boost the attack of nearby soldiers, +1 missionary. Lancers do increased damage to infantry and can strike from range. German Allies
-20% to Banner Army Food Costs Longbowman range increased. The priests of Xipe Totec send 12 Coyote Runners and boost all Coyote Runner attacks and armor. The priests of Centeotl send 18 Macehualtins and boost all Macehualtin hitpoints, range and line of sight. Trains:

Shipments:
Boats TEAM Crossbowmen, Longbowmen and Pikemen train faster. TEAM Crossbowmen, Longbowmen and Pikemen train faster. TEAM Crossbowmen, Longbowmen and Pikemen train faster. Allows you to send the Philosopher Prince, who advances you to Colonial Age and makes archaic units (Longbowmen and Pikemen) better. A stray dog in need of rescue. %s has rescued a War Dog! Four stray water buffalo, which you can capture. %1s has captured four stray water buffalo. El Pollo Guapo's guide to healthy living, which increases infantry HP of whomever recovers it by 5 percent. %1s has recovered El Pollo Guapo's guide to healthy living, which increases infantry HP by 5 percent. El Pollo Guapo's guide to proper discipline, which increases cavalry HP of whomever recovers it by 5 percent. %1s has recovered El Pollo Guapo's guide to proper discipline, which increases cavalry HP by 5 percent. El Pollo Guapo's long lost feed bag, which reduces cavalry training time by 5 percent. %1s has recovered El Pollo Guapo's feed bag, which reduces cavalry training time by 5 percent. The barbed spear of El Pollo Guapo, which increases hand cavalry damage against Villagers by 25 percent. %1s has recovered the barbed spear of El Pollo Guapo, which increases hand cavalry damage against Villagers by 25 percent. Three stray sheep. %s has found three stray sheep. Three stray dogies (Cows), which you can capture. %1s has recovered three stray dogies (Cows). Three stray llamas, which you can capture. %1s has recovered three stray llamas. Four stray llamas, which you can capture. Black Flag Army spawn Configure this Wonder to produce the Black Flag Army.

2 Steppe Rider %1.2fX Bonus Damage against %2s (%3s) Choose a specific variant of the map. Only supported on certain maps. Default Map Variability Summer (if applicable) Winter (if applicable) Old World (if applicable) The Strawberry Festival provides you with 500 Food for every 10 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. A successful Maple Festival provides you with 500 Coin for every 10 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Knowledge of the surrounding woodlands provides you with 500 Wood for every 10 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. The War Arrow! You get 1 Dog Soldier for every 3 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Worship of the God of Wealth, Tezcatlipoca, brings forth 1 Skull Knight for every 4 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Free cotton armor recruits 1 Puma Spearman for every 2 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. The Aztec nobles rally, giving you 1 Arrow Knight for every 2 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Emphasis on the Serpent Goddess, Coatlicue, summons 1 Macehualtin for every 2 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Preparation for the Pilgrimage to Mecca provides 1 Fattened Goat for every 2 minutes of game time. Mountain-dwelling allies of the Zapotec provide you with 100 high-altitude Wood in crates for every 2 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. The Huron mercantile monopoly permits you to get 1 Mantlet for every 2 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. It's the early fall Huckleberry Feast! You get 100 Food in crates for every 3 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Formal European recognition of the Mapuche nation provides 100 Coin in crates for every 2 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Worship of the Corn God, Cinteotl, recruits 1 Eagle Runner Knight for every 2 minutes of game length, up to 30 minutes. Anti-cavalry army of pikemen and ranged cavalry.
2 Qiang Pikemen: Archaic hand infantry good against cavalry and buildings.
3 Keshik: Ranged cavalry good against heavy cavalry. Well-rounded army of archers and pikemen.
3 Chu Ko Nu: Archaic archers good against infantry.
3 Qiang Pikemen: Archaic hand infantry good against cavalry and buildings. Anti-infantry army of archers and heavy cavalry.
3 Chu Ko Nu: Archaic archers good against infantry.
2 Steppe Riders: Hand cavalry good against Villagers and buildings. Mixed heavy cavalry army.
2 Iron Flail: Heavy cavalry good only against ranged infantry.
2 Meteor Hammer: Heavy cavalry that strikes from a distance, especially good against artillery. Anti-infantry army of riflemen and heavy cavalry.
3 Arquebusier: Ranged infantry good against infantry and light cavalry.
2 Iron Flail: Heavy cavalry good only against ranged infantry. Well-rounded army of swordsmen and riflemen.
3 Changdao: Hand infantry good against cavalry and buildings.
3 Arquebusier: Ranged infantry good against infantry and light cavalry. ESOC+ Maps A map-set that features only maps that were made by the ESOC team and others.
